posts.post_title: FS: n28 Ward & Clarkson n172 John Dickston
posts.post_content:
Hello Peeps,
The following cards are for sale. If you are interested please PM me for a photo. I will try and post some pictures later from my phone (scanner is broke).

n172 - Dick Johnston Batting PSA 2 $175
n28 - John Clarkson PSA 3 $450
n28 - John Ward SGC 20 $300

I am also open to any reasonable offers. Also willing to sell as a group.

Please excuse pics. Came out dark, tried to reduce glare.
